items.sentence: I never thought Tom would do something like that.
I often go out for a short walk just after lunch.
I ran as fast as I could, but I missed the train.
Tom doesn\'t know what this is called in English.
Tom doesn\'t know when Mary got back from Boston.
Tom doesn\'t know where Mary usually goes skiing.
Tom doesn\'t know whether to believe Mary or not.
Tom doesn\'t know why Mary wants to go to Boston.
Tom doesn\'t like being asked to give to charity.
He thanked the host for the very enjoyable party.
